amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit a cooperative marketing association from paying producers a price that is less than the minimum Federal milk marketing order blend price.
amendment.purpose: Amendment no. 4 printed in part B of H.Rept. 106-324 to prohibit a cooperative marketing association from paying producers a price that is less than the federal milk marketing order blend minimum price.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gutknecht amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 112 - 313 (Roll no. 432).
